name: MEGA LONG BLONDE SYNTHETIC !
description:
You will get a single thickness section of weft ideal for many projects. This is for a 30” very long section of platinum blonde synthetic hair, shade #613. Each section is 10” in width. Suitable for attaching with wig clips, hair glues, braiding, micro rings, shrinkies or sewing to a cornrow braid. Fringe pieces can also be attached with hairgrips under hairbands. Uses include: 
making extension pieces
cutting down to make clip in streaks (you will get a minimum of six from this one piece)
making a fringe (though I usually use two pieces sewn together for this purpose - or teamed up with another colour for a unique look)
thanks x

name: PINK AND BLACK STREAKS SYNTHETIC !
description:
You will get a single thickness section of weft ideal for many projects. This is for 24” long section of Magenta Pink and Black striped synthetic hair. Each section is 8” in width. Uses include: 
making an extension piece (one piece will go from ear to ear)
cutting down to make clip in streaks (you will get 5-6 from this one piece)
making a fringe (though I usually use two pieces sewn together for this purpose)
THANKS X

name: MEGA LONG HONEY BLONDE SYNTHETIC !
LILAC SYNTHETIC !
description:
You will get a single thickness section of weft ideal for many projects. This is for 18” long section of Palest Lilac synthetic hair. Each section is 9” in width. Uses include: 
making a clip on extension piece (one piece will go from ear to ear
cutting down to make clip in streaks (you will get 6 from this one piece)
making a fringe (though I usually use two pieces sewn together for this purpose)
THANKS X
